com.aliyun.odps.graph
Class AggregatorOwnerPartitioner

java.lang.Object
  com.aliyun.odps.graph.AggregatorOwnerPartitioner
Direct Known Subclasses:
HashAggregatorOwnerPartitioner
public abstract class AggregatorOwnerPartitioner
extends Object

Aggregator的分区类，决定某个Aggregator的owner定位到哪个Worker 可以通过JobConf.setAggregatorOwnerPartitionerClass(Class)方法自定义分区类，否则使用默认的分区类 HashPartitioner

Constructor Summary
AggregatorOwnerPartitioner()
           
 
Method Summary
 void configure(Configuration conf)
          此方法会在分区类对象被new出来后立即调用，传入运行时的JobConf对象
abstract  int getOwner(int aggregatorId, int workerNum)
          给定 AggregatorId 和 Worker 个数，决定该aggregator的owner定位到哪个Worker.

Method Detail

configure

public void configure(Configuration conf)
               throws IOException
此方法会在分区类对象被new出来后立即调用，传入运行时的JobConf对象

Parameters:
conf - 运行时的JobConf对象
Throws:
IOException

getOwner

public abstract int getOwner(int aggregatorId,
                             int workerNum)
给定 AggregatorId 和 Worker 个数，决定该aggregator的owner定位到哪个Worker.

此方法通常实现为对AggregatorId的某个哈希函数，默认的分区类 HashAggregatorOwnerPartitioner

Parameters:
aggregatorId - Aggregator序号，该值对应该Aggregator在Aggregator列表中从0开始的序号. 例如第一个aggregator对应的aggregatorId为0,第n个aggregator对应aggregatorId为n-1.
workerNum - 分区数，既 Worker 个数
Returns:
分区序号，必须是 0 到 numWorkers-1
